Class Raytracer.JSONSerializable

  • java.lang.Object
    • Raytracer.JSONSerializable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Raytracer.Color, Raytracer.Light, Raytracer.Scene, Raytracer.SceneObject, Raytracer.Vector2, Raytracer.Vector3
    Enclosing class:
    Raytracer

    class Raytracer.JSONSerializable
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for all classes which can be saved into a JSON file. Supports serializing this object into a JSONObject and deserializing a JSONObject back into a real java.lang.Object with the same data.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      JSONSerializable​()  
      JSONSerializable​(JSONObject j)
      Constructs a JSONSerializable object from the values in the JSONObject (JSON deserialization).

      Deserializes a JSONArray of JSONObjects into a ArrayList of the correct type.

      JSONArray      		 toJSONArray​(java.util.ArrayList<T> array)
      Serializes an ArrayList into a JSONArray of serialized JSONObjects.

      • JSONSerializable

        JSONSerializable​()

      • JSONSerializable

        public JSONSerializable​(JSONObject j)
        Constructs a JSONSerializable object from the values in the JSONObject (JSON deserialization).
        Parameters:
        j - the JSONObject containing the values for this object.

    • Method Detail

      • toJSONObject

        public JSONObject toJSONObject​()
        Serializes this object into a JSONObject. Stores the name of this class into the "type" entry of the JSONObject. Subclasses should override this method, call super.toJSONObject() to get a JSONObject, and then store all their necessary data into that.
        Returns:
        the JSONObject containing this object's data.

      • fromJSONArray

        protected <T extends Raytracer.JSONSerializable> java.util.ArrayList<T> fromJSONArray​(JSONArray jsonArray)
        Deserializes a JSONArray of JSONObjects into a ArrayList of the correct type.
        Parameters:
        jsonArray - the JSONArray to deserialize.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of the deserialized array elements.

      • toJSONArray

        protected <T extends Raytracer.JSONSerializable> JSONArray toJSONArray​(java.util.ArrayList<T> array)
        Serializes an ArrayList into a JSONArray of serialized JSONObjects.
        Parameters:
        array - ArrayList to serialize.
        Returns:
        a JSONArray of serialized JSONObjects.
